mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf at Bahrain and the Political Agent at Bahrain relating to the Fortnightly Political Appreciationof the Information and Broadcasting Department, Government of India. The file contains only covering letters and notes of receipt. No copies of the report are present. The reports were classified as secret and have probably been destroyed.Folios 38-39 are internal office notes.
